title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Residential Leasing
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us     Residential Leasing              Residential Leasing of Park Buildings       The National Park Service at Valley Forge National Historical Park currently has one historic building available for residential lease, the Lund house. Parties interested in the opportunity should carefully review the Request for Bid (RFB) for more information and deadlines.   The RFB provides the opportunity for an interested individual or organization to submit a proposal to the National Park Service to lease this property. Whoever submits the bid for the property, judged best under the RFB selection criteria, will be given an opportunity to negotiate a final lease agreeable to both the offeror and the National Park Service.  Â      Front entrance of the Lund House. NPS Photo.  The National Park Service at Valley Forge National Historical Park currently has one residential unit available for the coming school year. Parties interested in this opportunity should carefully review the request for bids for more information and deadlines. Please click here to learn more about this RFB.
